questions.question: What did Jeannette do when she saw her mother rooting through a dumpster?

choices.answer: Helped her find some reusable items
Took her mother out to eat at a seafood buffet
Ran down the alley and hid
Asked the taxi driver to take her home

questions.question: When Jeannette met her mother for lunch and offered to help, what did her mother ask for?

choices.answer: Sell geodes and other desert rocks

questions.question: What word best describes the relationship between Rex and Grandma Smith (Rose Mary's mother)?

"We were already halfway to Vegas without you!"

questions.question: What was Rex's nickname for Jeannette?
What did Brian do with the Sad Sack comic book he got for his birthday?

choices.answer: used it to start a fire

questions.question: Battle Mountain won a newspaper contest that said it was:

choices.answer: the ugliest, most forlorn, most godforsaken town in the USA
the most economically stable desert city
the safest place in the country to raise children

questions.question: Why does Jeannette accept the ring from Billy?

choices.answer: she wants to be his girlfriend
she wants to give it to her Mom

questions.question: Why does the Walls family leave Battle Mountain?

choices.answer: a gunfight between the Walls kids and Billy
they run away from the debt Rex has built up at the bar
they get caught scamming the bank

choices.answer: he puts tile over the old wood floor
he stuffs them full of newspaper
he takes out the rest of the floor so it's even
he pounds cans flat and nails them over the holes

questions.question: What zoo animal does Rex allow Jeannette to pet?
When the family left Arizona, what did they do with their house?

choices.answer: allowed the gypsies to live there

choices.answer: They answered a multiplication question incorrectly

Jeannette and Brian could not understand the Principal
Rose Mary insisted they were slow learners

questions.question: Why were the Walls children banished to the basement while Rex & Rose Mary were away?

choices.answer: Lori punched Erma in the jaw
Erma didn't like that Jeannette went swimming with Dinitia
They caught Erma being a pervert

questions.question: Why didn't Jeannette finish paining the house?

choices.answer: She couldn't reach the high up parts

questions.question: What did Jeannette learn about whoring at Ginnie Sue's house?

choices.answer: It was gross and resulted in having lots of kids
It put chicken on the table
All moms did it sometimes to make ends meet
You had to be attractive to be successful at it

questions.question: In sixth grade, how did Jeannette feed herself?

choices.answer: She found food in the garbage that other kids threw away
She and Brian ate pokeweed that grew behind their house
She started babysitting and ate other people's houses
She put her parents on a budget and used their $ to buy food

questions.question: What was the best time Jeannette recalled having in the summer in Welch?

choices.answer: Working an internship at the local paper
Swimming in the irrigation ditch with Brian and Maureen
Swimming at the free swim with Dinitia

questions.question: Why was Jeannette so angry after the child-welfare man left?

choices.answer: Because he said they were poor
Because he didn't do a thorough investigation
Because she was afraid her family would be split up
Because he didn't take her away immediately

questions.question: What was Rose Mary's reaction to the visit from the child-welfare man?

choices.answer: She bought some appliances on layaway

put it back after a few days

stay strong as a family no matter what

choices.answer: "Life with your father was never boring"
